languages.text: Every time the Cyber-Eagle ascends, it receives +3 to its key stats. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Every time the Cyber-Eagle ascends, it receives +3 to its key stats. Stacks.

languages.text: Whenever the cyber-eagle starts {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, it gains +3 to its key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}. Stacks and lasts until the end of combat.
languages.original_text: Поднимаясь {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}в воздух{/g}, киберорел получает +3 к ключевым {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристикам{/g}. Суммируется и длится до конца боя.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the cyber-eagle starts {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, it gains +3 to its key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}. Stacks and lasts until the end of combat.

languages.text: Siber kartal, {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}yükselmeye{/g} başladığında kilit {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}niteliklerine{/g} +3 puan kazanır. Üst üste birikir ve çatışma sonuna dek sürer.
languages.original_text: Whenever the cyber-eagle starts {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, it gains +3 to its key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}. Stacks and lasts until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Siber kartal, {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}yükselmeye{/g} başladığında kilit {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}niteliklerine{/g} +3 puan kazanır. Üst üste birikir ve çatışma sonuna dek sürer.

languages.text: Quand le cyber-aigle prend son {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}envol{/g}, il gagne +3 à ses {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g} clés. Cet effet est cumulable et dure jusqu'à la fin du combat.
languages.original_text: Whenever the cyber-eagle starts {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, it gains +3 to its key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}. Stacks and lasts until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Quand le cyber-aigle prend son {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}envol{/g}, il gagne +3 à ses {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g} clés. Cet effet est cumulable et dure jusqu'à la fin du combat.
Quand le cyber-aigle est en {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}vol{/g}, il gagne +3 à ses {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g} clés.
Quand le cyber-aigle est en {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}vol{/g}, il gagne +3 à ses {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g} clés.

languages.text: Beginnt der Cyber-Adler zu {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}kreisen{/g}, erhält er +3 auf seine wesentlichen {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g}. Stapelbar und dauert bis zum Ende des Kampfes an.
languages.original_text: Whenever the cyber-eagle starts {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, it gains +3 to its key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}. Stacks and lasts until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Beginnt der Cyber-Adler zu {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}kreisen{/g}, erhält er +3 auf seine wesentlichen {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g}. Stapelbar und dauert bis zum Ende des Kampfes an.
Wenn der Cyber-Adler {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}aufsteigt{/g}, erhält er +3 auf seine wesentlichen {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g}.
Wenn der Cyber-Adler {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}aufsteigt{/g}, erhält er +3 auf seine wesentlichen {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g}.

languages.text: サイバーイーグルが{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}舞い上がり{/g}を開始すると、その主要な{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}が+3される。この効果は戦闘終了までスタックし、継続する。
languages.original_text: Whenever the cyber-eagle starts {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, it gains +3 to its key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}. Stacks and lasts until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: サイバーイーグルが{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}舞い上がり{/g}を開始すると、その主要な{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}が+3される。この効果は戦闘終了までスタックし、継続する。
サイバーイーグルが{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}舞い上がる{/g}と、その主要な特性が+3される。

languages.text: 当生化猎鹰进入{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}腾空{/g}状态时，所有关键{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}提高3点。此效果可叠加，持续至战斗结束。

traits.locale_text: 当生化猎鹰进入{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}腾空{/g}状态时，所有关键{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}提高3点。此效果可叠加，持续至战斗结束。

languages.text: Siempre que la ciberáguila se {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}eleva{/g}, gana +3 a sus {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g} clave. Este efecto es acumulativo y dura hasta el final del combate.
